strapiPost.title: Crafting Into The Holidays
strapiPost.content:
Craft fair season is shifting into holiday market season, which means there is about to be all sorts of wonderful local gifts to give. 

  • Raising funds: The NWA Holiday Market is this Friday and Saturday (Nov. 5-6) at the Northwest Arkansas Convention Center for anyone who wishes to attend. There will be a $5 entrance fee at the door, which will go to the Children’s Safety Center of Washington County. 
  • Market: It will be the 3rd year for this market and will have handcrafted items, clothing, jewelry, décor, repurposed items, and so much more. So go check it out, find some gifts, and support the Children’s Safety Center. 

For more details, click HERE.
